creator: a.abfalterer@gmail.com
text:
Hi,

Testing mod_proxy_wstunnel I encountered a connection close on client-side due to an idle timeout. I needed some time to identify the problem as there was no log message written. Also the status code 200 in the access_log was misleading.

After studying the code I understood why mod_proxy_wstunnel never returns with HTTP_REQUEST_TIMEOUT («Avoid sending error pages down an upgraded connection»). 

However, I think the module should at least write a log entry upon connection terminations.

Cheers,

Armin
